DOC.brief_summary: Among 10 premenopausal woman Metabolic Syndrome : Specific Aim 1 : Compare effect acute fat feeding flow mediate dilation ( FMD ) measure brachial artery reactivity among three fat challenge ( saturate fat vs. monounsaturated fat ( MUFA ) vs. polyunsaturated fat ( PUFA ) 4 hour post feed . Hypothesis Saturated fat feed impair FMD MUFA PUFA feeding . Specific Aim 2 : Compare effect acute feed vascular inflammation measure VCAM sICAM among three fat challenge 3 1/2 hour post feed . Hypothesis : Saturated fat feed increase vascular inflammation MUFA PUFA .
DOC.brief_title: Fat Effects Women With Metabolic Syndrome
DOC.criteria: Female , 1850 year age , Premenopausal , Weight stable least 3 month , Not plan lose gain weight 3 month , Meets follow 3/5 criterion metabolic syndrome : increase blood sugar increase blood fat ( triglyceride ) , increase blood pressure , decrease good cholesterol ( HDLC ) . increase waist circumference , History diabetes mellitus Fasting glucose ≥ 126 mg/dL History cardiovascular disease ( peripheral vascular disease , coronary artery disease , cerebrovascular disease ) Pregnant planning pregnancy within study period Fasting triglycerides > 500 mg/dL Currently take lipid lower medications** Oral patch hormone contraception** Currently take vasoactive ( blood pressure ) medications** SBP ≥ 140 and/or DBP ≥90 mm Hg take blood pressure lower Rx Chronic use aspirin ( prn use allow ) Chronic use nonsteroidal antiinflammatory medication ( prn use allow ) Tobacco use within 6 month start study Participation another clinical trial within last 30 day History active gall bladder disease History digestive malabsorptive disease require treatment surgery Moderate severe lactose intolerance Milk Allergy Walnut Allergy Nut Allergy Coconut allergy ( ** ) Drugs within follow classification exclusionary : Lipid lowering , beta blocker , ACE inhibitor , angiotensin receptor blocker , diuretic , calcium channel blocker , alpha blocker , nitrate , hormone contraception include patch oral hormone contraception ( Hormone contain IUDs vaginal ring okay )
